PRODUCT.NAME: Armani Jeans Crew Neck Gradient T Shirt White
PRODUCT.PRODUCTDETAIL: Armani Jeans Crew Neck Gradient T Shirt In White, A classic t shirt with a ribbed crew neckline and short sleeves. An overall dip dye effect gradient design in white and navy.
PRODUCT.SIZE: Regular fit,The model (height 5'8" and chest 33") is wearing a size S
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Define style this season with Armani's new range of trendy tops, crafted with intricate details. Create a chic statement look by teaming this lace number with skinny jeans and pumps.

PRODUCT.NAME: Versace Jeans Reversible Leather Belt Black
